name: notes-2-self
description: No-shit notes, how-to's, pointers, tips, and tricks.
author: Joseph R Miles <joe@notes2self.com>

scripts.deploy: npm run build && gh-pages -d public -b master
scripts.deploy:travis: npm run build && gh-pages -d public -b master -r https://$GH_TOKEN@github.com/joebobmiles/Notes2Self.git
